description: This file implements an authentication service class (`AuthService`) for a healthcare appointment management system backend. It provides functionalities for user login validation, token generation, and seed-admin user creation, referencing user model and utility functions for password comparison, hashing, and token generation.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A class providing authentication-related functionalities such as login and admin seed creation.

methods.name: login({ email, password })
methods.description: Validates user credentials and returns an authentication token along with user info.

methods.name: seedAdminIfMissing({ name, email, password })
methods.description: Checks if an admin user exists by email, and if not, creates one with the provided details.

ctags.name: seedAdminIfMissing
ctags.pattern: /^  static async seedAdminIfMissing({ name, email, password }) {$/
